PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Power BI Developer and Data Analyst with 4 years of expertise in business intelligence, data visualization, and analytics. Proficient in Power BI, SQL, DAX, and Azure cloud platform. Proven track record of delivering actionable insights through interactive dashboards and reports.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
- Business Intelligence: Power BI, Tableau, Excel, Power Query
- Databases: SQL Server, Azure SQL Database, MySQL
- Languages: SQL, DAX, MDX, Python
- Cloud: Azure, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse
- ETL: SSIS, Azure Data Factory
- Other: Git, JIRA, Agile/Scrum

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Senior Power BI Developer
Tech Solutions Inc. | Remote | Jan 2022 - Present

- Implemented complex DAX calculations for financial KPIs and business metrics
- Optimized data models reducing report load time by 60%
- Led migration of legacy reports to Power BI cloud service

Data Insights Corp. | Remote | Jun 2020 - Dec 2021

- Wrote complex SQL queries to extract and transform data from multiple sources
